title: Runescape community claims 'supreme victory' as developer apologizes and cuts pay-to-win features from hated battle pass
description: Jagex says it will patch out all the pay-to-win features of the pass, and is offering full refunds to players who paid for it.

title: I'm finally enjoying Starfield's combat after giving guns a giant buff
description: Less Borderlands, more Call of Duty please.

title: Fortnite creative boss Donald Mustard retires
description: Donald Mustard has been the chief creative officer at Epic Games, and Fortnite's 'Loremaster,' since 2016.

title: 10,000 milk cartons descend on Starfield's biggest city in newest physics benchmark
description: See that milk carton? You can spawn 10,000 of them.

title: How to spawn Starfield items by the thousands
description: Wanna watch 10,000 watermelons roll down a hill? Here's how to challenge your GPU with unreasonable Starfield physics tests.

title: Bethesda commissioned the internet's rotoscope jokester to get goofy with Starfield
description: The mind behind all those weird RPG skits has a succulent take on Starfield.

title: Assassin's Creed 4: Black Flag was pulled from sale on Steam and everyone got excited because they thought a remake was going to be announced, but Ubisoft says no, something's just broken
description: Sorry everyone, but I'm afraid your hopes for a Black Flag remake are going to have to wait a little longer.

title: The maker of The Witcher 3 and Cyberpunk 2077 HD Reworked mods is now working on one for Starfield
description: The first release of the Starfield HD Reworked mod should be out soon.

title: Here's why Venus is the best place to chill out in Starfield
description: A real-life quirk of the planet Venus makes it an extremely useful place to pass the time in Bethesda's space RPG.

title: Crypto baron behind $2.5B rug-pull declares 'I am smart enough to lead any institution on Earth' as court sentences him to 11,196 years in jail
description: Prosecutors had sought an even longer sentence.

title: Men of War 2 will now deliver men and war too in 2024
description: Developer wants to give fans "the bug-free experience they deserve."

title: It took more than 30 years but it's finally happening: Jean-Claude Van Damme is coming to Mortal Kombat
description: The legendary action star who inspired the Mortal Kombat character Johnny Cage will be available as an optional skin in Mortal Kombat 1.

title: How to add DLSS and Frame Generation to Starfield
description: As well as whether you should...

title: Starfield ending: Should you side with the Hunter or Emissary?
description: It can't be both, but it can be neither.

title: AMD rumoured to favour future AI chip production over GPUs but it's probably no reason to panic
description: A familiar scare story, but we're not terribly worried.

title: Caffeinated RGB gamer noodles now exist, and I'm getting indigestion just thinking about them
description: What hath gaming kind wrought.

title: Player acquires a massive faction stronghold in Starfield and lands it on a planet, 'still not really sure' how it happened
description: All your base are belong to us.

title: The Talos Principle didn't need a sequel, but now that I've seen it in action I'm glad that it's getting one
description: A puzzling return.

title: D&D's latest beta rules tinker with its classes and give Fighters the power to clobber fools real good with a chair
description: Five whole classes have new toys to test.

title: 12 cool games that risk getting lost in Starfield's black hole—including one that I can only describe as pure, irresistible evil
description: It's a killer month for games even outside the heavy hitters. Don't let these hidden gems pass you by.

title: 2008's Prince of Persia was one of Ubisoft's strangest experiments—but it's hardly aged a day in 15 years
description: From its unique combat system to its shocking twist ending, Ubisoft's failed reboot is full of character.

title: E3 somehow gets even deader as event organiser departs by 'mutual consent', ESA says no no it's still alive we promise
description: A big relaunch is apparently planned for 2025.

title: How to recruit Starfield's strangest companion
description: Add a historical celebrity to your crew.

title: Got a weird PC project in mind? Framework uncovered a horde of old mainboards in an old factory and is selling them off cheap
description: The perfect base for any weird and/or wonderful custom PC build.

title: Starfield player uses laundry basket to pull off the casino heist of the century
description: You'd be amazed what people throw out…

title: New mystery Valve hardware device certified in South Korea
description: Could it be a new Deck, a controller or maybe a VR headset?

title: This summer's hottest streamer game appears to be gone for good
description: Only Up!'s developer said "I want to put the game behind me."

title: D&D's new playtest canonises a subclass rename from Baldur's Gate 3, lead rules designer 'worked with Larian'
description: Totem no more.

title: Final Fantasy 14 won't be going free-to-play anytime soon
description: The subscription model is working just fine for Square Enix.

title: I've finally figured out the answer to Starfield's greatest mystery: why my spaceship's cargo hold is always full of misc items
description: No more will I be plagued by mystery slippers and mugs.

title: New Intel driver gives Starfield its eyebrows back
description: Driver bug that batted eyebrows clean off characters' faces has been fixed, but larger issues with Starfield on Arc graphics cards remain.

title: Worried about missing companion chats in Baldur's Gate 3? This mod aims to fix that
description: Proper pillow talk.

title: Early numbers indicate AMD's 7800 XT GPU is a hit. The 7700 XT not so much
description: Hardly surprising that the poor value 7700 XT isn't flying off shelves.

title: The RØDE Streamer X is the ultimate all-in-one streaming platform
description: The Australian technology innovator delivers a game-changing device for streamers.

title: Toyota factories grind to a halt after its servers ran out of disk space
description: I don't suppose anyone had a spare flash drive handy?

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #811: Friday, September 8
description: Get all the help you need with today's Wordle.

description: It's Friday. Let's make some Connections.

description: I had to see it, so you do too.

description: See the BG3 gang in adorable 2D form.
